name: FNaD 3: Golden Memories
description:
Game takes some time to load. Please be patient. Thank you :)

Finally finished FNaD 3! This is an easy game cause it only focuses on Golden's backstory. Hope you enjoy :)

Space - Flash

You are paranormal investigator and recently you found a restaurant in ruins. You decide to stay for a week in the place to try to catch some paranormal activity.
